titles: Peters teares A sermon, preached at S. Maries Spittle, the xv. of Aprill 1612. By Thomas Iacksonne Bachelour in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods holy word at Wye in Kent.
author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.
publisher: Printed by W. W[hite] for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Holy Lambe,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
